[[File:Lauch-party.jpg: '''Beowulf Launch Party''' was an online event dated of [[24 May]] [[2014]] to celebrate the release of the book ''[[Beowulf: A Translation and Commentary]]''. It was organized by [[The Tolkien Society]] and [[Middle-earth Network]] with support from [[Tolkien Brasil]] and [[The Tolkienist]].
* [[Michael D.C. Drout]]- [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-De5TpLrdVw  On Beowulf Tolkien Translation]
* [[Dimitra Fimi]]- [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XGmeRMUYah4 On Sellic Spell and Folktales]
* [http://www.tolkiensociety.org/events/beowulf-launch-party/ Beowulf Launch Party] at [http://www.tolkiensociety.org/ the Tolkien Society website]
